nodes.text: Sthonnart was a major in the New Republic Defense Fleet during the Galactic Civil War.

In the year 5.5 ABY, Major Sthonnart served in the fleet under the command of Luke Skywalker, the son of Anakin Skywalker, who directed a full scale assault against the warlord Shadowspawn. The major was stationed onboard the cruiser Justice where it was destroyed moments later during the start of the battle on Mindor. Afterwards, Sthonnart moved with the survivors inside a cave and were to await further instructions from Skywalker.
